title: UPGRADE HUAWEI ASCEND CRIKET ONLY
description:
YOUR HUAWEI ASCEND MUST BE ROOTED BEFORE YOU BEGIN

Select Backup Current ROM (do NOT skip this step!) Device will restart and backup. After it has restarted, go back into ROM Manager and select Reboot into Recovery. Device will boot into the Clockworkmod Recovery mode.

Select and click yes (using trackball):

wipe data/ factory reset

wipe cache

Go to advanced, then select wipe dalvik cache

Go to mounts and storage, format: boot, data, system, cache (only these!)



Go back to main screen.

Select install zip from sdcard, then choose zip from sdcard

Now select CM7-Ascend-05212011-signed.zip (located where you downloaded to on your sd card). Then install cm7_gapps.zip, now go to advanced, then select fix permissions. Reboot, setup your newly installed 2.3.4 on your Ascend!

FILE CONTAINS:

z4root

rommanager

read me

gapps

cm7.2 signed
